title: Chinese chicken and ginger steamed buns
ingredients: ['For the filling', '200ml chicken stock', '1 teaspoon agar agar flakes (see note)', '1 small piece of fresh root ginger, peeled', '1 spring onion, sliced', '180ml warm water', '250g chicken or pork mince', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons cooking wine', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'For the buns', '250g flour', '1 tablespoon oil', '150ml warm water']
